import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Footer = ({ className }) => { const footerLinks = [ { path: '/', label: 'Stories' }, { path: '/articles', label: 'Articles' }, { path: '/how-it-works', label: 'How it works' }, { path: '/sources', label: 'Sources' }, { path: '/shop', label: 'Shop' }, { path: '/sponsors', label: 'Sponsors' }, { path: '/contact', label: 'Contact us' }, ]; return (
{/* Navigation Links */}
{footerLinks.map((link, index) => ( {link.label} {index < footerLinks.length - 1 && ( )} ))}
{/* Credits Section */}

); }; export default Footer;
